s.text: With interest rate hikes a foregone conclusion, the Dow dropped 2.6% and the Nasdaq slid 3.77% on Friday.
With interest rate hikes a foregone conclusion, the Dow dropped 2.6% and the Nasdaq slid 3.77% on Friday.
According to today's Times, the program was killed yesterday after the story raised a fit of scorn.
Any public assistance recipient with a high school equivalency degree, 'a caring and compassionate personality' and the 'ability to read, write, and speak English'" could qualify, the story reported.
